title: Diamond-Adorned Bangles: Contemporary Kadas with a Touch of Tradition
materials: 22K Gold (approx.) with meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: These exquisite bangles showcase a modern design with alternating floral and geometric diamond settings. The unique angular pattern along the edges adds a contemporary flair, while the floral motifs subtly nod to traditional South Indian aesthetics. Superior craftsmanship ensures each diamond is securely set for maximum brilliance.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold complemented by the dazzling sparkle of colorless Diamonds.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special occasions. Its versatile design also makes it suitable for contemporary events and festive celebrations. These bangles are equally at home during a Sangeeth as they are at a cocktail party.
description: Crafted with exceptional attention to detail and featuring high-quality diamonds, these bangles are a testament to timeless elegance. The combination of modern design with subtle traditional elements ensures a lasting appeal. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a brilliant shine that will endure for generations. A true heirloom piece!
